languages.text: "Урбенд Драйвстем, вы допустили непростительную халатность, не поставив под сомнение причастность кого-то кроме Версенианов. Как удалось выяснить, покушение на меня организовал член дома Гапрак".

traits.locale_text: "Вы допустили непростительную халатность, обвинив лишь род Версериан и не поставив под сомнение причастность остальных. Как мне удалось выяснить, покушение на меня организовал член дома Гапрак".

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family besides the Werserians. We have discovered that the attempt on my life was orchestrated by a member of House Gaprak."
languages.original_text: "Урбенд Драйвстем, вы допустили непростительную халатность, не поставив под сомнение причастность кого-то кроме Версенианов. Как удалось выяснить, покушение на меня организовал член дома Гапрак".

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have shown inexcusable negligence by failing to question the involvement of any other family beside the Werserians. We have found out that the assassination attempt on my life has been organised by a member of House Gaprak."

"Urbend Drivestem, you have shown inexcusable negligence by failing to question the involvement of any other family beside the Werserians. We have found out that the assassination attempt on my life has been organised by a member of House Gaprak."

"Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family beside the Werserians. We have found out that the assassination attempt on my life has been staged by a member of House Gaprak."

"Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family beside the Werserians. We have found out that the assassination attempt on my life has been staged by a member of House Gaprak."

"Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family besides the Werserians. We have discovered that the attempt on my life was orchestrated by a member of House Gaprak."

"Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family besides the Werserians. We have discovered that the attempt on my life was orchestrated by a member of House Gaprak."

languages.text: 「アーベント・ドライブステム、お前はウェルザリアン家のみならず、他家が関与する問題への対処を明らかに怠った。これに弁解の余地はない。私の命を狙った暗殺未遂は、ギャプラック家の手の者によって仕組まれてたと判明した」
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family besides the Werserians. We have discovered that the attempt on my life was orchestrated by a member of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: 「アーベント・ドライブステム、お前はウェルザリアン家のみならず、他家が関与する問題への対処を明らかに怠った。これに弁解の余地はない。私の命を狙った暗殺未遂は、ギャプラック家の手の者によって仕組まれてたと判明した」

languages.text: “厄本·德莱夫斯塔，你犯下了不可饶恕的疏忽之罪。你根本没有想过韦尔森家族之外的其他人参与阴谋的可能性。我们已经发现，策划暗杀我的主谋另有其人，这个人来自贾帕克家族。”
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family besides the Werserians. We have discovered that the attempt on my life was orchestrated by a member of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: “厄本·德莱夫斯塔，你犯下了不可饶恕的疏忽之罪。你根本没有想过韦尔森家族之外的其他人参与阴谋的可能性。我们已经发现，策划暗杀我的主谋另有其人，这个人来自贾帕克家族。”

languages.text: « Urbend Drivestem, vous avez fait preuve d'une négligence inexcusable en omettant d'envisager la possibilité qu'une famille autre que les Werserian soit impliquée dans ce complot. Après avoir mené l'enquête, nous avons découvert que la tentative d'assassinat dont j'ai été victime a en fait été orchestrée par un membre de la maison Gaprak. »
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family besides the Werserians. We have discovered that the attempt on my life was orchestrated by a member of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: « Urbend Drivestem, vous avez fait preuve d'une négligence inexcusable en omettant d'envisager la possibilité qu'une autre famille que les Werserian soit impliquée dans ce complot. Après avoir mené l'enquête, nous avons découvert que la tentative d'assassinat dont j'ai été victime avait en fait été orchestrée par un membre de la maison Gaprak. »

languages.text: «Urbend Drivestem, ha demostrado ser negligente al no cuestionar la posibilidad de que otras familias además de la Werserian estuvieran implicadas. Hemos descubierto que el intento de atentado contra mi vida ha sido organizado por un miembro de la casa Gaprak».
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family besides the Werserians. We have discovered that the attempt on my life was orchestrated by a member of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: «Urbend Drivestem, ha demostrado ser negligente al no cuestionar la posibilidad de que otras familias además de la Werserian estuvieran implicadas. Hemos descubierto que el intento de atentado contra mi vida ha sido organizado por un miembro de la casa Gaprak».

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem, Ihr habt unverzeihliche Nachlässigkeit an den Tag gelegt, indem Ihr es versäumt habt, die Beteiligung anderer Familien als der Werserians zu untersuchen. Wir haben herausgefunden, dass das Attentat auf mich von einem Mitglied des Hauses Gaprak geplant wurde."
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family besides the Werserians. We have discovered that the attempt on my life was orchestrated by a member of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, Ihr habt unverzeihliche Nachlässigkeit an den Tag gelegt, indem Ihr es versäumt habt, die Beteiligung anderer Familien als der Werserians zu untersuchen. Wir haben herausgefunden, dass das Attentat auf mich von einem Mitglied des Hauses Gaprak geplant wurde."

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem, Werserian Hanesi dışındaki hanelerden birinin bu suça dâhil olabileceği ihtimalini göz önünde bulundurmayarak mazeretsiz ihmale yol açtın. Bana yönelik suikast girişiminin bir Gaprak Hanesi mensubunca düzenlendiği ortaya çıktı."
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have exhibited inexcusable negligence by failing to question the possible involvement of any other family besides the Werserians. We have discovered that the attempt on my life was orchestrated by a member of House Gaprak."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, Werserian Hanesi dışındaki hanelerden birinin bu suça dâhil olabileceği ihtimalini göz önünde bulundurmayarak mazeretsiz ihmale yol açtın. Bana yönelik suikast girişiminin bir Gaprak Hanesi mensubunca düzenlendiği ortaya çıktı."
